page.title: 18TOURISM, PLACE NAMES BODFARI
page.content: The village of Bodfari is situated in the picturesque Vale of Clwyd.During the year,especially during the summer, it attracts many tourists.To cater for holidaymakers there are caravan and camping sites offering various facilities. Though many visitors come from the Liverpool and Manchester areas,visitors from abroad such as Holland and America have visited the area. The area offers many walks along country lanes and on the surrounding hills. There are many interesting place names in the district such as Sodom and Aipht (Welsh for Egypt) as well as some charming Welsh place names_ Llety'r Eos and Coed yr Hirdir.
